name: Corpse Party 2: Dead Patient - Chapter 1: Another Jacket
name_original: Corpse Party 2: Dead Patient - Chapter 1: Another Jacket
description:
Corpse Party 2: Dead Patient - Chapter 1: Another Jacket is an adventure game developed by GrisGris. It came out on 29-05-2013. Grindhouse published the game.
Corpse Party 2: Dead Patient - Chapter 1: Another Jacket is available on PC.
